#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main() {
    char input_line[100]; // assuming input is not too long
    fgets(input_line, sizeof(input_line), stdin);
    // parse input_line into sa and sb
    char sa_str[20], sb_str[20];
    sscanf(input_line, "%19s %19s", sa_str, sb_str); // limit to prevent buffer overflow

    int a = atoi(sa_str);
    float sb_float = atof(sb_str);
    int b = (int)(sb_float * 100 + 0.1);

    int res = (a * b) / 100;

    // Now, convert res to string
    char res_str[20];
    sprintf(res_str, "%d", res);

    // Replace commas with spaces
    for (int i = 0; res_str[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        if (res_str[i] == ',') {
            res_str[i] = ' ';
        }
    }

    printf("%s\n", res_str);

    return 0;
}
